title: Robust Watch Face
summary: A Fibrous watch face for Moto 360,LG G Watch R & other android smart watches

descriptionHTML:
Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!

Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188


Model Number
DW-A07

Category
Casual

ROBUST Watch Face is a Elegant watch face available for all smart watches, a Interactive Touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).

And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


FREE VERSION INCLUDES

 Interactive Touch
 Sweep & Tick Needles
 Date
 Wear Battery
 Phone Battery
 Default Ambient Mode Pack with Unlimited Colors
 Custom Ambient Mode with Unlimited Colors
 FULL-COLORED AMBIENT
 Short & Big Notification Cards
 Translucent Notification Cards
 Notification Setting for Ambient Mode
 Dark & Light Status Bar
 Dark & Light Hotword
 Dark Whole Screen Option
 square & round watches support

PREMIUM VERSION INCLUDES

 Interactive Touch
 Night Mode
 Different Needles
 Unlimited Colors Theme

Configuration:

 Turn On / Off Interactive Touch
 Turn On / Off Night Mode
 Pick Your Favorite Color Scheme
 Pick Your Favorite Needles
 Switch between Tick & Smooth Needle
 Show/Hide Date Display
 Show/Hide Battery Display
 Pick Your Favorite Ambient Mode
 Pick Your Favorite Ambient Mode Color
 Short & Big Notification Cards
 Translucent Notification Cards
 Notification Setting for Ambient Mode
 Dark & Light Status Bar
 Dark & Light Hotword
 Dark Whole Screen Option

INTERACTIVE TOUCH INCLUDE FOLLOWING SETTINGS

 Turn On / Off Interactive Touch
 Switch to Night Mode
 Show/Hide Date Display
 Show/Hide Battery Display
 Switch between Sweep & Tick Needle Style
 Pick Your Favorite Needle
 Pick Your Favorite Color Theme

For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose ROBUST Watch Face as your watch face


Note
Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches & other android smart watches...
comments: Твърде алчно , пич!  Дизайн нулев.   Итерации под нулата.  - Колко ли ще припечелиш от този подход и натрапчиви реклами?!
Can't get this face to load. First face I've had a problem with. I have Fossil Q Founder.
Wow if this watchface has this many ads... I can't even give it a try. Uninstalled .
Nice watch face Very simple. Nice looking watch face. Like it alot.
